page.title: SirNukes texts
page.t: Removes the animation and associated delay for top menus opening
Stops the one-time help text popups from displaying
Globally increases the font size of tooltips (originally 9 pt)
Sets the alpha value of the map menu; egosoft default is 98, set to 100 to remove transparency
Forces the map to open focused on the player location always, instead of the current target location
Changes the FoV multiplier; ui will shrink
